Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides a tax credit to taxpayers who grow the base ingredients necessary for the production of beer
Summary: Provides a tax credit to taxpayers who grow the base ingredients necessary for the production of beer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax incentive to a taxpayer that grows base ingredients used for the production of beer
